long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
這款套件可以自動跳過 YouTube 影片中的廣告，為您提供更愉快的觀看體驗。不再需要等待廣告播放完毕，您可以直接享受您喜愛的影片。安裝後，套件將在您觀看 YouTube 影片時自動處理廣告，無需進一步操作。輕鬆跳過廣告，讓您節省寶貴的時間！
請注意！第一次需要手動打開本插件，以便啟動插件功能。

This extension automatically skips advertisements in YouTube videos, providing you with a more enjoyable viewing experience. No more waiting for ads to finish – you can dive right into your favorite content. Once installed, the extension will handle ads automatically as you watch YouTube videos, requiring no additional action on your part. Skip ads effortlessly and save valuable time! Please note! The first time, you'll need to manually enable the extension to activate its functionality.
